about_the_game: This game transports players into a mysterious and challenging world where they assume the role of a ghostly doll, navigating through levels using the ASDW keys to move, avoid obstacles, and collect rewards. Throughout the game, players will encounter various hazards such as flames and monsters, requiring them to dodge these obstacles cleverly to progress. As the levels advance, the difficulty gradually increases, presenting greater challenges. The game offers a wide variety of rewards, ranging from extra lives to powerful items, each accompanied by special sound effects when collected, adding more fun to the gameplay. Additionally, there are specific sound effects when players fail in the game, enhancing the overall gaming experience. This is a high-difficulty game, ideal for those who enjoy challenging themselves.

name: Sycophant

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10 64-bit
  • Processor: Intel I5 4690 / AMD FX 8350
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GTX 970 / RX 480 (4GB+ of VRAM)
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
